entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming north 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
